column2: "Hiii! ARKS's number one information dealer, Patty here!"
"Have you heard about the amazing ARKS? What's amazing about them? Pretty much everything!"
"To translate, she's talking about the six people who hold absolute authority within ARKS. They're known as the Council of Six."
"Yeah, those guys! Turns out I met one of them in person!"
"It was like, ka-boom! And then, ka-bam! Just really amazing!"
"She did see something, but it was from pretty far away, so don't take her too seriously."
"But it's true that their power is far beyond that of most people. A fancy title only gets you so far, after all."
"But the really amazing thing is that she just looks like a normal little girl!"
"I wonder if I can become like that if I try?"
